item.title: Xbox Game Pass Gets 13 Games in December 2025
item.content:encoded:
Xbox Game Pass game additions for December 2025 have been revealed, and we are receiving 13 new games this month.

A new month has arrived, which means new titles will be added to all subscription services. We already know which games are leaving Game Pass in December 2025, and now we have been informed about the games that will be added this month. Lost Records: Bloom & Rage was added in December as well, and is available today.

Xbox Game Pass Adds Mortal Kombat 1, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle and More in December 2025

Starting with the first title, Monster Train 2 will be available for cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X/S on December 3. On the same day, Spray Paint Simulator will be added for cloud, console, and PC. On December 4, Game Pass will add a game preview for 33 Immortals on cloud, console, and PC, and also Indiana Jones and the Great Circle for cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X/S. Another game that will be added on December 4 is Routine, a Day One release for cloud, console, handheld, and PC.

Moving onto December 9, Game Pass will add A Game About Digging a Hole to cloud, handheld, PC, and Xbox Series X/S. Death Howl will be added for handheld and PC on the same day and is a Day One release. The third and final title being added on December 9 is Dome Keeper, and it will be available for cloud, console, handheld, and PC.

On December 10, the big one: Mortal Kombat 1 is added to cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X/S. Bratz: Rhythm & Style will follow on December 11 and will be available on cloud, console, and PC. Moreover, Stellaris, World War Z: Aftermath, and Medieval Dynasty will be added for Game Pass Essential on December 3. Readers can check out the official blog for more details.

What are your thoughts on the new game additions for Xbox Game Pass in December 2025? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about IO Interactive CEO unofficially confirming Hitman 4. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Marvel Rivals Players Can Now Buy & Gift Items Directly From Discord
item.content:encoded:
Discord is rolling out a new commerce experience for users and has partnered with Marvel Rivals as the first title with integrated shopping and gifting.

Launching just in time for the Marvel Rivals anniversary celebrations and the holiday season, players in the Marvel Rivals Discord will be able to browse and purchase digital goods within the Marvel Rivals Discord.

Players in the Marvel Rivals Discord can now create a wishlist of the items they want to add to their collection and gift in-game items to their friends, with purchased and gifted items instantly accessible within Marvel Rivals.

Discord says the integration is a huge boost for players and developers alike, as gifting isn’t limited to players of the game, so items can be gifted to friends to encourage them to jump into the game, extending in-game currency, and building upon the existing gifting behavior on Discord.

It’s added that 20% of all Shop purchases on Discord are gifts, a number that increases to almost 30% during the holiday season, so the integration is described as “a natural evolution of how people use Discord to connect and celebrate together.”

Initially, the integration will support purchases in USD only on the Discord desktop client, though players from the US, Canada, Ireland, and Oceania will be able to use it. Additional regions and platform support will be explored in the future, Discord says.

Additional game support is expected to be added in the future as part of the feature’s evolution.

What do you think about the new Discord gifting feature for Marvel Rivals? Share your thoughts in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Marvel Rivals, read about the addition of the 18v18 Annihilation game mode, and check out details of Envy pulling out of Marvel Rivals Esports.

item.title: Six Games Are Leaving Xbox Game Pass This December
item.content:encoded:
It has been confirmed that six games will leave Xbox Game Pass in December 2025, including Hollow Knight.

Xbox Game Pass receives a new set of games each month across two waves. The first wave for December 2025 has not yet been announced; however, the games leaving this month have already been confirmed. In the meantime, check out the nine games that were added in November Wave 2, including The Crew Motorfest, Lost Records: Bloom & Rage, and more.

Hollow Knight and More Removed from Xbox Game Pass in December 2025

As mentioned above, the big title leaving Xbox Game Pass in December 2025 is Hollow Knight, specifically the Voidheart Edition. This edition offers players the original award-winning adventure, along with four content packs that expand the game with new quests, boss fights, and abilities.

The next big game that is leaving Xbox Game Pass in December is Mortal Kombat 11, the last title before the whole universe was reborn. The other four titles that will be removed from the service this month are Wildfrost, Paw Patrol World, Cataclismo, and Still Wakes the Deep. Players should note that the last date to play these games through Xbox Game Pass is December 16, 2025.

In other news, here’s a guide on how you can claim Fortnite Crew with the help of Xbox Game Pass Ultimate. Additionally, check out the five games that were removed from the Game Pass library last month. What are your thoughts on the games being removed from Xbox Game Pass in December 2025? Are you going to play any of them before they leave? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Fortnite’s Chapter 7 Season 1 launch, bringing in over 10 million players. Don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Survive Wave Z Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Survive Wave Z monthly redeem codes for December 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Scrap and much more.

Are you a fan of the classic multiplayer Call Of Duty game mode Zombies? If so, Survive Wave Z is going to be right up your alley, and you need to check out this Roblox wave defence experience immediately. As the name of the game suggests, players are tasked with defending and surviving against endless waves of enemies, with the end goal being to survive Wave Z, which is considered the last one. There is a wide variety of weapons and other items that the players can use in their mission to survive, but not all of them will be available for use at the start of the game.

As is the case with most games of this genre, unlocking powerful weapons required a massive amount of grinding, and for players who are new to the game, acquiring some of these can seem like a pipe dream. That’s where these codes can come to the players’ aid. They provide free rewards to the players, including key resources like Scrap, making it a key part of the game. Redeeming these codes will help players get ahead of the competition and progress through the levels faster than they otherwise would be able to. 

Active Survive Wave Z Codes

  • LAUNCH – 5000 Scrap

Expired Survive Wave Z Codes

As of the writing of this article, there are no expired codes in Survive Wave Z, as the game only came out quite recently. The one active code given above is the only one that has been released by the developers so far. However, with the game’s increasing popularity, new codes are likely on the horizon. As soon as any of the active codes expire, they will be moved to this section of the page.

How To Redeem Survive Wave Z Codes

Redeeming codes in Survive Wave Z is as simple as navigating through the menus and inputting one of the active codes into the correct text box. There are no prerequisite steps, making it a very beginner-friendly process. For players who are new to the Roblox, however, here’s a step-by-step guide:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Survive Wave Z.
  2. Click on the settings button at the top of the screen.
  3. Scroll down till you see the codes text box.
  4. Input one of the active codes listed above into the text box.
  5. Click on the Submit button to claim your rewards.

How To Get More Survive Wave Z Codes

New Roblox game codes are often released by the developers through the game’s official Discord server, through the Roblox game page, or on their social media pages. However, tracking all of these regularly can be a hassle, and that’s where this article can be a lifesaver. We update this page with new codes as soon as they drop, so we recommend that all players bookmark this page to not miss out on any free rewards. 

Enjoying our Roblox games codes coverage? Check out the codes for popular games like Steal A Brainrot, Radiant Residents, and Fix It Up on Insider Gaming!

Interested in the latest developments in the world of gaming and esports? Then join the Insider Gaming Discord server and engage with the passionate community.

item.title: All Marvel Cosmic Invasion Characters & How to Unlock Them
item.content:encoded:
Marvel Cosmic Invasion has soared onto the scene, with the beat ’em up title boasting an impressive roster of characters, including several that are locked behind progression.

In the Insider Gaming review of Marvel Cosmic Invasion, a ‘Great’ verdict of the game was issued, with the title attracting praise for providing chaotic gameplay in a good way, with a perfect balance of depth to keep players engaged, but not overwhelmed, in the vintage beat ’em up.

If you’re diving into Marvel Cosmic Invasion but want to know how to unlock a specific character, or are wondering who there is to choose from on the roster, this guide has all the crucial details.

All Marvel Cosmic Invasion Characters & How to Unlock

There are 15 playable characters in Marvel Cosmic Invasion, four of which are locked behind specific requirements in progression.

The base roster in Marvel Cosmic Invasion is kind, with 11 characters unlocked by default, including fan-favorites like Captain America, Spider-Man, Wolverine, and Rocket Raccoon.

However, Jean Grey/Phoenix, Venom, Phyla-Vell, and Silver Surfer must be unlocked by completing specified missions, which require exploring several areas of the game as split paths present themselves regularly. Due to this, you won’t be able to unlock all the characters immediately, and will have to backtrack at some points.

The challenge of unlocking the restricted characters is not difficult, however, as you only need to complete the specified levels, and don’t need to achieve any particular objectives, though this means potentially venturing out of your way to the four individual levels containing the locked characters.

The full list of playable characters in Marvel Cosmic Invasion and how to unlock them is shown in the table below.

Who is your favorite character to use in Marvel Cosmic Invasion? Share your thoughts in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For your next read, take a look at the best co-op games for the family this holiday season, and check out all the platforms where you can play Marvel Cosmic Invasion.
